alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 3:34PM MST until December 01 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...St. Maries, Lookout Pass, Wallace, Mullan, Osburn, Fourth Of July Pass, Fernwood, Kellogg, Pinehurst, and Dobson Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
